name: Julia Purwadi
description: Julia is a junior majoring in Business Administration with a focus on marketing. She has been a dedicated member of Alpha Zeta since her freshman year. She enjoys traveling, snowboarding, attending music festivals, and spending time with her AZ brothers.

name: Austin Lin
description: Austin is a junior majoring in Economics and Data Science, with a master's in Applied Data Science. He is interested in machine learning and AI in finance. In his free time, he enjoys music (singing, producing, DJing), basketball, and exploring LA's restaurants.

name: Anya Yang
description: Anya is a junior majoring in Business Administration and AI Applications. In her free time, she enjoys collecting blind boxes, trying new restaurants, and solving crossword puzzles. Her dream is to one day be on Family Feud.

name: Charlie Huang
description: Charlie is a junior majoring in Business Administration with an emphasis on finance. He is pursuing a career in investment banking and enjoys playing basketball, tennis, golf, snowboarding, cooking, and going to the beach in his free time.

name: Fiona Ko
description: Fiona is a junior double majoring in Business Administration and Human Biology. She is passionate about finance, biology, fashion, and art history, and enjoys exploring these fields during her free time.

name: Julie Wan
description: Julie is a junior majoring in Business Administration and minoring in Digital Studies. She is interested in marketing and the beauty industry.

name: Brandon Chung
description: Brandon is a junior majoring in Business Administration. He is passionate about finance and enjoys playing basketball and poker in his free time.

name: Justin Xiang
description: Justin is a junior majoring in Business Administration. He is from New Zealand and enjoys snowboarding in his spare time. Justin joined Alpha Zeta in his sophomore year and is interested in Investment Banking.

name: Eddie Wang
description: Eddie is a senior majoring in Business Administration. He is interested in a career in consulting and enjoys spending his free time outdoors, playing pickleball, and hiking.

name: Ben Lee
description: Ben is a senior majoring in Business Administration and is also pursuing a Masterâ€™s in International Trade Law and Economics. He has been involved in Alpha Zeta since 2022 and has previously served as an AZ Group Head and Professional Chair.

name: Jocelyn Tang
description: Jocelyn is a junior majoring in Business Administration with an emphasis in finance. She has been an active member of Alpha Zeta since her sophomore year and enjoys traveling, kickboxing, and watching F1 in her free time.

name: Darren Tsang
description: Darren is a junior pursuing an M.S. in integrated design, business, and technology alongside a B.S. in Business Administration. He enjoys playing golf, basketball, and powerlifting in his free time.

name: Elena Mao
description: Elena is a junior double majoring in Business Administration and Accounting. She enjoys baking, thrifting, and road trips, and is passionate about exploring different artistic pursuits.

name: Anson Chu
minor: Law and Technology, Applied Analytics, AI Applications
description: Anson is a junior majoring in Political Economy and minoring in Applied Analytics, LawTech, and AI Applications. He enjoys playing volleyball, watching trending shows, and discovering new music in his free time.

name: Aaditya Surya
description: Aaditya is a junior majoring in Computer Science and Business Administration. He enjoys developing innovative tech solutions and collaborating on projects that address real-world challenges.

name: Walker Blackwell
description: Walker is a junior majoring in Business Administration and Theatre. He is passionate about investment banking, acting, and public speaking. He co-founded the Prison Mathematics Project, combining his interests to create meaningful impact.

name: Amelie Nah
description: Amelie is a sophomore majoring in Biopharmaceutical Sciences. She is interested in healthcare consulting and enjoys hiking, swimming, and being active.

name: Aidan Han
description: Aidan is a junior majoring in Music Industry. He has produced Billboard hits for artists like Polo G and enjoys playing billiards, exploring the city, and DJing in his free time.

name: Claire Yang
description: Claire is a sophomore majoring in Computer Science and Business Administration. She is passionate about the intersection of business and technology, and enjoys cafe hopping, doing nails, and spending time with family and friends.

name: Daniel Yang
description: Daniel is a sophomore majoring in Artificial Intelligence for Business with a minor in Philosophy. He enjoys technology and business for social impact, along with gardening, camping, and cooking.

name: David Yu
description: David is a junior majoring in Accounting and Finance, with a focus on investment banking. Outside of school, he enjoys hiking, cooking, and whiskey tasting.

name: Esther Ji
description: Esther is a junior majoring in Business Administration with a minor in Health Innovation. She is pursuing a career in healthcare strategy and enjoys trying new restaurants, film photography, and gymnastics.

name: Evan Zhang
description: Evan is a junior majoring in Business Administration with a minor in AI Applications. He is passionate about product management and enjoys hiking, traveling, and discovering new cafes.

name: Gloria Pan
description: Gloria is a sophomore majoring in Business Administration with interests in marketing and design. She enjoys film, photography, visiting art museums, and spending time with family and friends.

name: Jonathan Lee
description: Jonathan is a senior majoring in Business Administration. He has been an active member since his junior year and is passionate about pursuing a career in the sports industry.

name: Kevin Lyu
description: Kevin is a senior majoring in Business Administration. He enjoys playing golf, working out, reading about sports cars, and attending raves.

name: Lilian Nguyen
description: Lilian is a sophomore majoring in Business Administration with a minor in Public Relations. She enjoys exploring corporate communications and influencer marketing, and in her free time, she enjoys visiting cafes, playing New York Times games, and watching YouTube.

name: Lorena Liu
description: Lorena is a junior majoring in Business Administration with a minor in Data Science. She enjoys movies, jazz dancing, badminton, and extreme sports for stress relief.

name: Oliver Angsono
description: Oliver is a junior from Indonesia majoring in Finance and Accounting. He enjoys playing golf and soccer in his free time.

name: Shania Tang
description: Shania is a sophomore double-majoring in Business Administration and Accounting. She loves to bake and play water polo in her free time.

name: Jason Zhang
description: Jason is a sophomore majoring in Economics with a minor in Musical Studies. He enjoys practicing piano and guitar, hiking, reading, and attending concerts.

name: Chris Feng
description: Chris is a sophomore majoring in Business Administration. He loves playing volleyball, exploring new places, and going to raves. In his free time, he stays active by joining friends for weekend adventures, whether itâ€™s discovering new cafes or hiking nearby trails.

name: Jason Byun
description: Jason is a sophomore majoring in Physics and Computer Science. After crossing last semester, he has been eager to apply his new skills in various areas. He enjoys thrifting, singing, watching TV shows, and experimenting with different activities to stay creative.

name: Meiyi Song
description: Meiyi is a senior double majoring in Business Administration and Communication, with a minor in Cinematic Arts. She has been part of Alpha Zeta since her sophomore year. Meiyi grew up in Montreal and Toronto, speaking French, Mandarin, and Spanish. She loves fashion, tennis, snowboarding, and exploring new foods.

name: Rachel Lee
description: Rachel is a junior majoring in Design with a minor in Web Development. Sheâ€™s passionate about branding and UI/UX design. Outside of academics, she enjoys cafe hopping and trying new restaurants. Rachel also loves discovering hidden gems in the cityâ€™s food scene and experimenting with new design ideas.

name: Isabelle So
description: Isabelle is a junior majoring in International Relations and Global Business with a focus on international finance. She aims to work in investment banking. Isabelle enjoys swimming, watching movies, exploring restaurants, and beach outings. She is also an active member of Delta Gamma sorority.

name: Leena Van
description: Leena is a sophomore majoring in Business Administration with a minor in Artificial Intelligence Applications. She hails from Dallas, TX, and loves listening to jazz and RnB, reading webtoons, and cooking for friends and family. A fun fact about Leena is that she has a dorm cat named Soju, who keeps her company.

name: Nayeon Koo
description: Nayeon is a junior double majoring in Sociology and Data Science. She spends her free time building model kits, going on road trips, and hiking with friends. Nayeon is always on the lookout for new places to explore and enjoys the challenge of discovering remote hiking trails.

name: Isabella Martinez
description: Isabella, or Bella, is a junior majoring in Business Administration and minoring in Legal Studies. Sheâ€™s passionate about the intersection of business and law. When not studying, she loves exploring LA with friends, skiing back in Colorado, and diving into new cultural experiences.
